title: Who
description: We are Qatar's trusted national donation platform, dedicated to building secure, transparent, and impactful giving experiences.

values.title: Security
values.desc: Every donation is encrypted, monitored, and protected under Qatar's compliance laws.

values.title: Transparency
values.desc: Track your donations with complete visibility from donor to beneficiary.

values.title: Trust
values.desc: Backed by RACA & integrated with Sandi for fairness and accountability.

missionText: To revolutionize charitable giving in Qatar by combining innovation, compliance, and compassion and ensuring every contribution reaches those in need with maximum impact.
